entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this morning. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
